title: Strategic Response Model
description: Schema for defining strategic responses to triggers or intents, supported by rationale.

responseID.description: A unique identifier for the strategic response

responseTitle.description: A short title summarising the response

responseType.description: The classification of the response, e.g., Policy Change, Initiative, etc.

responseDescription.description: Detailed description of the strategic response

triggerReferences.description: List of trigger IDs linked to this response

intentReferences.description: List of strategic intent IDs that initiated this response

rationaleReferences.description: List of rationale IDs linked to this response

performanceIndicatorReferences.description: List of linked performance indicator IDs linked to this response

affectedDomains.description: List of affected business architecture domains

implementationPlan.description: Reference or summary of the implementation plan

expectedOutcomes.description: Anticipated results from implementing the response

strategicThemes.description: Array of strategic priorities this initiative supports

alignmentStrength.description: Numeric rating (1-5) of alignment with strategy

adjacentInitiatives.description: Related initiatives that complement this one

strategicLevers.description: Business mechanisms being utilized (e.g., scale, scope, differentiation)

intentID.description: Unique identifier for the strategic intent

title.description: Concise name describing the strategic intent

description.description: Detailed explanation of the intent's purpose and scope

strategicObjectiveReference.description: Direct link to the relevant strategic objective

uncertaintyLevel.description: Assessment of associated risks and unknowns

responseReferences.description: Strategic responses initiated by this intent

responsibleStakeholders.description: Key organizational units or roles championing the intent

rationaleReferences.description: List of rationale IDs providing justification for this intent

performanceIndicatorReferences.description: Metrics or KPIs that will be used to measure the success of the strategic intent

status.description: The current status of the strategic intent

lastUpdated.description: The date when the strategic intent record was last updated
